data.name: Desolation Seed
data.detailed_description:
Desolation Seed is a cyber terrorism simulator with cyber security and exploration elements. Society is a decay system you are imprisoned as the reveled flesh that feeds the cybernetic wire, through a cryptic email chain Oceancide Systematics a mysterious corporation pays you to perform seemingly random acts of debasement against society on their behalf. they seethe within the darkened vomitoriums of computational networks. do these debased acts of destruction hold any meaning? can you break from out the hollow shell of pleasure systems? how far will they push you? how far will you go? Nothing can prepare you for the apex of human understanding.



▫ Engage in virtual Cyber Terrorism via the world wide web



▫ Be immersed in fully computerized and detailed desolated landscapes



▫ Communicate with the many NPCs : dialog from shared cloud codex

▫ Make technological society pay by unleashing malware onto specific targets critical to its functionality

▫ Employ a variety of malware to contaminate globally connected networks and crucial infrastructure

▫ Use the world wide web to target individuals & destroy misanthropic systems

▫ Explore the endless wasteland of abandoned networks, urban ruins & navigate the polluted expanse of ecological decay with smooth flight controls

▫ Experience cybernetic euphoria and rage with inconsequential remote killing



▫ Engage in biometric security puzzles to progress in the game

▫ Low resolution hell interface, Hobbesian game mechanics

▫ Upgrade and acquire powerful computers to improve your lethal range.


▫ Explore the surveillance megacomplex & navigate sentinel networks to destroy targets



* Some information above is subject to update as development progresses. follow page for frequent updates

data.short_description: a horror simulator exploring the consequences of technological society set in a cybernetic purgatory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: contains depictions of blood, gore, destruction of critical infrastructure and simulated cyber terrorism
